articles.description: Football-starved fans around the world are given some relief as the Bundesliga resumes following its coronavirus-enforced suspension, with teams struggling to adapt to playing inside empty stadiums.
articles.content:
From empty stands, to disinfected balls and a potential television audience of 1 billion people, the Bundesliga has enjoyed a chequered restart as the first major sports league to resume amid the COVID-19 pandemic.
